plot: An autobiographical story about the character assassination of an artist who questions the loss of ethics and misinterpretation of what constitutes public grant-funded art in a small town community.
title: The Last Angry Man
plot_es: An autobiographical story about the character assassination of an artist who questions the loss of ethics and misinterpretation of what constitutes public grant-funded art in a small town community.
plot_en: An autobiographical story about the character assassination of an artist who questions the loss of ethics and misinterpretation of what constitutes public grant-funded art in a small town community.
